changeNote.en-GB: This US-specific entity is not appropriate for Media Topics.  The general concept of government-provided health care is covered by the parent.

definition.dk: Et offentligt finansieret sundhedsforsikringssystem i USA for personer, der er mindst 65 år eller handicappede.
definition.en-GB: A program of the U.S. government to provide health care to senior citizens
definition.en-US: A program of the U.S. government to provide health care to senior citizens
definition.pt-BR: Programa do governo norte-americano para fornecer cuidados de saúde a cidadãos idosos.
definition.pt-PT: Programa do governo norte-americano para fornecer cuidados de saúde a cidadãos idosos.
definition.se: Ett offentligt finansierat sjukförsäkringssystem i USA för personer som är minst 65 år eller handikappade.
definition.zh-Hans: 美国政府为老年人提供的医疗保健计划
